page.title: 06Bredwardine; Employment.
page.content: About half the population in the area is engaged in farming and there is very little employment other than this. Other people have employment or business in Hereford, Hay-on-Wye, or in neighbouring villages, but there are no job prospects for young people in the area unless they belong to farming families. There is also a high proportion of retired people in the area, some of whom formerly worked in the area, but many who have come here from the cities. The latter have very varied backgrounds, which include such fields as business, education, medicine, and science. Some have had periods of residence abroad. There are also a few self-employed craftsmen, chiefly connected with the building trade.
